topic.title: Irish Government tells to only listen to 'trusted media' about COVID-19
topic.body:
"If we want to halt the spread of COVID-19 it is for all of us to act responsibly in our day-to-day lives, listen to what our public health officials, international health organisations (WHO and ECDC) and trusted media tell us and act accordingly. "

"(...) we all have a social responsibility to educate ourselves and others about COVID-19 so that we can protect everyone from catching the infection. Trusted sources of information are those providing advice and information which is public health-led and based on sound scientific evidence. These include websites of the Government, HSE and health agencies, official posters and leaflets in public places, as well as reputable news organisations. >>IT IS IMPORTANT NOT TO RELY ON OR SHARE UNKNOWN AND UNSOURCED COMMENTARY FOR YOUR UPDATES<<."

So Guys, no zeronet conspiracy theories about covid-19.

src: https://assets.gov.ie/71728/2b46989c737f4b689eb87842ce80325b.pdf
In Ireland's official 16th of March COVID-19 response plan.

topic.title: COVID-19 Ireland official: 80% light, 14% severe, 6% serious symptoms. Child most immune!
topic.body:
"(...)Its symptoms, which can take up to 14 days to show, may include a cough, shortness of breath,
breathing difficulties and fever (high temperature). Information from the European Centre for Disease
Control (ECDC) suggests thatʹ

- 80% of people infected will experience a mild to moderate illness, which can be managed at home
and will make a full recovery,
- 14% of patients may experience more severe symptoms,
- 6% of people may become more seriously infected and will require hospital care. "
"Children can be infected and become ill but
seem less susceptible than persons over the age of 20 years."

Ireland's official 16th of March COVID-19 response plan:
src: https://assets.gov.ie/71728/2b46989c737f4b689eb87842ce80325b.pdf

topic.title: ➤➤ Not enough death! Russians are too healthy according to USA papers.
topic.body:
American media has no interest in food quality or toxicity levels in Russia however they insist too few Russians die of virus and clearly Russians must be lying about real numbers. Guys and gals, this is rich! It is amusing to see how desperate the American press is.

https://www.rt.com/usa/488690-western-media-russia-coronavirus-numbers/
https://www.rt.com/op-ed/488640-covid-msm-russia-death-toll/
https://www.rt.com/news/488543-lockdown-who-coronavirus-russia-vujnovic/

"WHO representative to Russia, Melita Vujnovic: Nations must develop “a capacity to quickly detect new cases, to quickly identify all the contacts, test them and quarantine them – instead of going for full lockdowns,” the health expert added." Let me clarify that in my own words: 'We need to able to battle surround and terrorize into submission all dissidents abusing freedom of speech'.

And those who decide to self medicate might be exactly the people who knew about big farma conspiracy. They might have boosted their immune systems by eating clean organic farm produce and detoxed with herbs periodically. Their death rate would be vastly smaller!

Now Russians make many tests and test their population and say things are getting better, UV light of the summer sun will further kill viruses while UN says it will come back. You know, somehow they know that but cannot produce tests and cannot give any scientific details. Just imagine the sheer extremity of frustration when massive country like Russia might question basis for 'the state of emergency' and power grab.
